hero.title: BLOCKBOOST
hero.subtitle: Unique WEB3 Crowdfunding Ecosystem
hero.description1: Are you ready to access some of the most exclusive and promising crypto startups? block boost is your gateway to early-stage investment opportunities, which our team has thoroughly vetted.
hero.description2: There are many other advantages of being a part of the Blockboost Crowdfunding Ecosystem with unique features like Launchpad, Bridge & Swap AI, Earning system, Vault, Marketplace, and Staking.

ecosystems-utilities.title: Block Boost Ecosystems
ecosystems-utilities.box-one-description: Decide your tier, stake $BBT, and participate in all the token launches we bring to you in a guaranteed way.
ecosystems-utilities.box-two-description: By connecting with different blockchains you can swap your tokens to different blockchain networks with few clicks.
ecosystems-utilities.box-three-description: Earn passive income through various features like Referral rewards , Staking rewards, Vaulting rewards, NFT sells.
ecosystems-utilities.box-four-description: You can earn the high yield APY through staking your crypto assets by selecting the various Vaults.

join-idos.title: Easy To Join IDOs With 3 Steps
join-idos.box-one-description: Buy $BBT tokens and connect your wallet with launchpad ecosystem to participate.
join-idos.box-two-description: Block Boost will showcase a fixed tier system based on the number of tokens staked.
join-idos.box-three-description: Win confirmed lottery tickets to participate in IDOs through our staking tier system.

exclusive-benefits.title: Exclusive Benefits Of Buying $WZP In The Presale
exclusive-benefits.box-one-description: Participate in early stage of presale to get more valuation of your investment compare to the launch price. Also, you can refer your friends and earn both 5% bonus during presale.
exclusive-benefits.box-two-description: After successful launch still you can refer through your unique referral link from our dashboard app and earn the 2% trading rewards of your referrals trading activities.
exclusive-benefits.box-three-description: Hold the $BBT and earn passive income. Just seat and relax to get share of your holding rewards from traded volume of $BBT and claim it through our dapp every hour.
exclusive-benefits.box-four-description: Stake $BBT to earn reward and get guaranteed allocation for the launchpad. It will be rewarded from staking supply of our ecosystem.
exclusive-benefits.box-five-description: Stake any tokens to earn with automatic compounding. you can stake any token to earn $BBT as an compounding reward. It will be rewarded from vault supply of our ecosystem.

connectWallet.title: CONNECT WALLET
connectWallet.description: Use Metamask or Trust Wallet to connect your wallet in seconds.

confirmTransaction.title: CONFIRM TRANSACTION
confirmTransaction.description: You can buy $BBT with ETH, BNB, MATIC, USDT and USDC

claimToken.title: CLAIM TOKEN
claimToken.description: Congratulations! You can claim your $BBT after the pre-sale ends.

tokenomics.title: Token Details
tokenomics.description: Distribution of Token will take place after Presale ends. You will be able to claim the purchased $BBT Tokens from our presale page.
tokenomics.name: Name

faq.title: FAQ
faq.answer-one: Blockboost is a unique crowdfunding ecosystem for crypto startups.
faq.question-two: Where can I purchase the Blockboost Token and when I will receive it?
faq.answer-two: During the presale, you can purchase $BBT tokens from our official website www.blockboost.io; you can claim your tokens from the presale page after the presale ends.
faq.question-three: Will my rewards always be paid hourly?
faq.answer-three: Yes, you have to claim the reward from our official dapp via connecting your wallet.
faq.question-four: How can I become eligible for the presale rewards?
faq.answer-four: You can get your referral link from the presale page and purchases made through it will be auto-credited to your account on the presale page. You can check it by connecting your wallet to the presale page.
faq.question-five: How many stages are there in the presale?
faq.answer-five: There are 20 stages in the presale, and the price of $BBT will increase at each stage.
faq.question-six: Is there staking on $BBT and when will it be available to stake?
faq.answer-six: Yes, please see the staking page for complete information on staking pools and rewards.
